attacks.name: Absorb Vitality
attacks.effect: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sonic Evil
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Doom Count-GX
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has exactly 4 damage counters on it, that Pokémon is Knocked Out. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
